data.caption: Un-Audited Financial Results For Quarter Ended 30.06.2023
data.news_body: Un-audited Financial Results for quarter ended 30.06.2023.

data.caption: Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of Bhandari Hosiery Exports Limited (The Company).
data.news_body: 1. Considered and approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2023 (Copy enclosed), along with the unmodified Auditor''s Report received from M/s Raj Gupta & Co, Statutory Auditors of the Company. A declaration pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI (LODR) is also enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of Bhandari Hosiery Exports Limited (The Company).
data.news_body:
Board of Directors of the Company in its Meeting held on 26th May, 2023, have inter-alia, transacted the following businesses:

1. Considered and approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2023.
2. Recommended a final dividend of Re 0.01/- per Equity Share (i.e. l%) having Face Value of Re. 1/- (Rupee One Only) each for the Financial Year 2022-2023.
3. The Board considered and approved the proposal of raising equity capital through the Rights Issue to partly finance the Expansion Plan that has been taken up by the Company with the loan assistance from State Bank of India.
4. Appointment of Mr. Rajeev Bhambri as the Secretarial Auditor of the Company for the Financial Year 2023-24 with immediate effect.

data.caption: Revised Unaudited Financial Results As On Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31.12.2020.
data.news_body:
With reference to the outcome of board meeting held on 13.02.2021, we would like to inform you that due to error/mistake while setting off tax expenses figures of profit for the continuing operations after tax in column quarter ended 31.12.2020 and year to date for the current year 31.12.2020 were wrongly mentioned as 154.16 and 35.93 instead of 135.16 and 16.93 respectively.

Further we declare that this was totally unintentional error/mistake. We produce the correct figures, this figure mismatch was due to set off of tax expenses. So net profit available for shareholders in column quarter ended 31.12.2020 and year to date for the current year 31.12.2020 are also considered as 135.16 and 16.93 respectively. We are hereby attaching revised unaudited financial results for quarter ended as on 31.12.2020 and nine months ended as on 31.12.2020.
